translation.en: [narrator] It begins like this.
Two billion years ago, an amoeba.
translation.es: Hace dos mil millones de años,con una ameba.

translation.en: Wait, let's... Let's back up. I've skipped too many connections.
Out of nothing, in an instant... everything.
translation.es: De la nada, en un instante, todo.

translation.en: An infinite cosmic orgy of matter and energy,
translation.es: Una orgía cósmica eternade materia y energía

translation.en: rubbing, bumping, and grinding together.
There would be no galaxies, no suns, no planets,
no life without collisions of heavenly bodies.
translation.es: ni vida sin la colisiónde cuerpos celestes.

translation.en: Back to our amoeba.
It engulfs a bacterium with unique powers, and... voilà...
translation.es: Absorbe una bacteriacon poderes únicos y ya está.

translation.en: Earth's first photosynthesis-enabled organism.
translation.es: El primer organismo de la Tierraen realizar la fotosíntesis.

translation.en: Maybe it was chance.
Maybe it was inevitable.
This one changed amoeba
becomes the ancestor of every living plant on Earth,
translation.es: es el antecesorde las plantas de la Tierra,

translation.en: which in turn floods the planet with oxygen...
translation.es: que a su vez llenan el planeta de oxígeno.

translation.en: paving the way for every other form of life we know,
translation.es: Eso allana el caminopara todas las formas de vida

translation.en: leading to more souls, more connections,
translation.es: y genera más almas y conexiones

translation.en: and therefore more new worlds branching outward from the first.
translation.es: y, por lo tanto, más mundos nuevosque surgen del primero.

translation.en: These forces of nature, when they converge,
translation.es: Cuando convergenestas fuerzas de la naturaleza,

translation.en: be they astronomical collisions, biological unions,
translation.es: ya sean colisiones astronómicaso uniones biológicas,

translation.en: demonstrate the infinite potential of our connections.
translation.es: demuestran el infinito potencialde nuestras conexiones.

translation.en: This truth also extends to the human heart.
translation.es: Esta verdad también se manifiestaen el corazón humano.

translation.en: Pack of Stuttons.
No offense, but how are you gonna pay for these?
I'm gonna use an ad Buddy to cover this purchase.
translation.es: Usaré PubliAmigos para hacer esta compra.

translation.en: Those assholes record client conversations.
translation.es: Esos idiotas grabanlas conversaciones de los clientes.

translation.en: National Database of Desires.
translation.es: La base de datos nacional de deseos.

translation.en: The businessmen, ever hear of it?
They know you better than you know you.
-Okay. -It's not a conspiracy,
just a conspiracy theory.
[narrator] Hypothesis:
all souls are on a quest to connect.
Corollary:
our minds have no awareness of this quest.
translation.es: nuestra menteno es consciente de esta búsqueda.

translation.en: Did you know that most quarters have been swallowed and defecated by a human?
translation.es: ¿Sabías que a la mayoría de las monedaslas tragó y defecó un humano?

translation.en: [narrator] Hypothesis: all the worlds that almost were
translation.es: Hipótesis: todos los mundos que casi existieron

translation.en: matter just as much as the world we're in.
Corollary:
these hidden worlds cause us great pain.
translation.es: estos mundos ocultosnos causan un gran dolor.

translation.en: [man] ...no wallet, no shoes.
No idea how I even really got to Poland in the first place.
translation.es: Ni idea cómo llegué a Poloniaen primer lugar.

translation.en: Bro, I'm telling you, this was seriously such a crazy situation.
translation.es: Amigo, te digoque realmente fue una locura.

translation.en: Th... From Poland... I was in...
I had no idea... I had no idea how I got there.
translation.es: No sabía cómo había llegado ahí.

translation.en: [narrator] Camaraderie, communion,
family, friendship, love, what have you.
translation.es: familia, amistad, amor o lo que sea.

translation.en: We're lost without connection.
[audio billboard] ...long-distance relationships are tough. Thank you, Friend Proxy.
translation.es: TODO SABE MEJOR CUANDO ESTÁN JUNTOS

translation.en: [narrator] It's quite terrible... to be alone.
Put simply, my goal is to eradicate all...
unnecessary and inefficient forms of human pain.
translation.es: ...las formas innecesarias e ineficientesdel dolor humano.

translation.en: Forever.
We must evolve past our suffering.
It's trash, not a handout. Let's move it.
What are you, a cop?
Not much of a difference authority-wise. Let's go.
translation.es: Tengo casi la misma autoridad. Vamos.

translation.en: [narrator] My research into this matter is... of course, ongoing.
translation.es: Mi investigación sobre este asunto,por supuesto, está en marcha.

translation.en: [man] The witness has already been sworn in.
Mr. Milgrim, can you state for the court
your relationship with the defendant, Mr. Jed Milgrim?
translation.es: cuál es su relación con Jed Milgrim,el acusado?

translation.en: He's, um...
-He's my brother. -[man] Thank you.
Have you ever been arrested?
-No. -[man] Are you married?
-No. -[man] Children?
[man] And can you tell us about the psychotic break
that you experienced roughly ten years ago?
translation.es: que sufrió hace unos diez años?

translation.en: -Really? -[man] I'm just asking.
That's how they're gonna start? Dad, come on.
It doesn't necessarily mean that it'll be like that in the trial, Owen,
translation.es: No significa necesariamenteque será así en el juicio, Owen,

translation.en: but, uh, sometimes prosecutors, they...
They try, uh, atypical inroads...
to crack you.
That's why we, uh... We have to prep for the unexpected.
translation.es: Por eso debemos prepararnospara lo inesperado.

translation.en: Can you resume, please?
Have you ever been hospitalized for mental illness?
translation.es: ¿Alguna vez lo hospitalizaronpor una enfermedad mental?

translation.en: Yes, ten years ago.
Please explain what happened.
translation.es: Por favor, explique lo que pasó.

translation.en: [Owen] I was hospitalized...
and medicated...
and...
that was the last episode I had.
translation.es: Ese fue el último episodio que tuve.

translation.en: Wasn't the nature of this psychosis delusional?
That you sometimes thought you saw your brother when he wasn't there?
translation.es: ¿A veces creía que veía a su hermanocuando no estaba ahí?

translation.en: [Owen] Not exactly.
Just say no.
Then what was the nature of this psychosis?
translation.es: ¿Cuál era la naturaleza de la psicosis?

translation.en: [sighs] Owen, don't you think that your mental illness
translation.es: Owen, ¿no cree que su enfermedad mental

translation.en: should disqualify you from testifying as a witness on your brother's behalf?
translation.es: lo descalifica para declararcomo testigo de su hermano?

translation.en: Look, there's only one question here that really matters.
translation.es: Solo hay una preguntaque realmente importa.

translation.en: Owen, do you know what is real?
One hundred percent.
I'm compos mentis.
[woman] Welcome to New York.
And this is Statue of Extra Liberty.
translation.es: Y esta es la Estatua de la Libertad Extra.

translation.en: Statue of Extra Liberty. Okay.
translation.es: La Estatua de la Libertad Extra.

translation.en: [man] How'd the trial prep go for a naughty brother?
translation.es: ¿Y la preparación del juiciodel hermano travieso?

translation.en: Did you tell 'em about me?
You're not supposed to be here.
[man] Good. You're still using the code words,
translation.es: - No deberías estar aquí.- Bien. Aún usas las palabras clave,

translation.en: even though I am technically invisible.
Owen, this week must be a doozy for you, huh?
translation.es: Owen, esta debe seruna semana difícil para ti, ¿no?

translation.en: You thought you were rid of me, but I have new information.
translation.es: Pensaste que te librarías de mí,pero tengo información nueva.

translation.en: This time I know.
You've been chosen to save the world.
translation.es: Te eligieron para salvar el mundo.

translation.en: You're gonna be a hero.
I don't want this. I don't want it.
translation.es: No quiero esto. No lo quiero.

translation.en: I don't want this. The details of the mission will be delivered to you by an agent, a woman.
translation.es: - No quiero esto.- Una agente te contará sobre la misión.

translation.en: You'll know her when you see her, trust me.
Just make contact with her.
The pattern is the pattern.
She'll reach you for further instructions!
[yells] Don't fuck this up!
[automated voice] Welcome. Please make a selection to begin.
translation.es: Bienvenido. Elija una opción para comenzar.

translation.en: You selected single ride.
How will you pay?
You selected credit.
Please swipe now.
Declined. Insufficient funds.
Would you like to use an ad Buddy to add funds?
Yes or no?
Welcome.
[Ad Buddy] Okay, Mr. Milgrim, I'm gonna need your attention.
translation.es: Bueno, Sr. Milgrim,voy a necesitar su atención.

translation.en: "When tragedy strikes others, it's sometimes hard to know what to do until now..."
translation.es: "Cuando ocurre una tragedia,a veces es difícil saber qué hacer".

translation.en: "Daddy's Home. Consider becoming a temporary volunteer mail-order husband
translation.es: "Llegó Papá. Considere seresposo voluntario y temporal por correo

translation.en: and changing the lives of a heartbroken family in your region."
translation.es: y cambiar la vidade una familia destrozada en su región".

translation.en: Okay, well, up next,
we got something called Neberdine Pharmaceuticals.
"Good afternoon, Owen.
Did you know that your rent comprises 87.2 percent of your annual income?"
translation.es: ¿Sabías que tu alquiler comprendeel 87,2 % de tus ingresos anuales?".

translation.en: Is that actually true?
-I just moved into my own place. -[Ad Buddy] Manhattan these days...
translation.es: Acabo de irme a vivir solo. Así es Manhattan.

translation.en: I'm over in an underground warehouse unit.
-I actually live in Roosevelt Island. -Okay, well...
translation.es: Vivo en la Isla Roosevelt. Bueno.

translation.en: Uh, let's see. Oh-ho-ho.
"A catastrophic interruption in your professional life,
like a furlough, could ruin you.
Ever thought about supplementing your income with pharmaceutical testing?"
translation.es: ¿Pensó en complementarsus ingresos con pruebas farmacéuticas?".

translation.en: Friend Proxy.
"Tired of spending your time and energy making friends?"
translation.es: "¿Cansado de gastar tiempo y energíahaciendo amigos?".

translation.en: [sales rep] And that is why Daddy's Home is happy to welcome you, Mr. Milgrim.
translation.es: Por eso nos complace darle la bienvenidaa Llegó Papá.

translation.en: [Owen] And I'd have to cover relocation costs?
[sales rep] And inherit any potential debt of the deceased.
translation.es: Y heredaría las deudas del difunto.

translation.en: That doesn't make sense.
[sales rep] So, that's a yes?
To what?
[sales rep] It makes perfect sense.
-We are offering you heroism. -[man] So this is your office area.
translation.es: - Ofrecemos heroísmo.- Esta es su oficina.

translation.en: Again, it's a question of commitment.
[Owen] Your ad is misleading,
'cause you refer to it as a volunteer opportunity,
translation.es: porque dicen que es una oportunidadde ser voluntario,

translation.en: but in the end I'd have to pay.
translation.es: pero al final tendría que pagar.

translation.en: [sales rep] But think about what you'd be getting. -A wife, lonely, in need. -[Owen] Yeah.
translation.es: Pero piense en lo que conseguiría.Una esposa sola y necesitada.

translation.en: [Owen] Uh, I have to go.
[man] Rozo did the anonymous hammerhead from the top down
and came back with a 12-bullet short-termer.
translation.es: y decidió darles licencias brevesa 12 personas.

translation.en: -When? -[man] Well, they randomized the pattern.
We've sent out 30 memos on it since this morning.
Um, so this furlough, how long does it last?
-It's temporary. -[Owen] Right.
So... when am I back?
Oh, I don't know. I was kidding. It's probably permanent.
translation.es: No lo sé. Era una broma. Tal vez sea permanente.

translation.en: I was using your kind of humor,
translation.es: Estaba usando tu tipo de humor,

translation.en: when you say something you don't mean and nobody laughs.
translation.es: cuando dices algo que no quieresy nadie se ríe.

translation.en: It's... Yeah, it's okay. I'll just...
I'll just dip into my savings.
Oh, okay.
Bye.
[man] Okay, Owen.
-Do you know what I want to do? -[Owen] Yes.
[man] Are you sure you know what I want to do?
[Owen] Yes.
[man] The way this deprogramming works, it's not an overnight fix.
translation.es: Esta desprogramaciónno funciona de la noche a la mañana.

translation.en: You have to listen to it like a mantra.
If you start feeling paranoid, you play this tape right away, okay?
translation.es: Si empiezas a sentirte paranoico,pones esta cinta enseguida, ¿sí?

translation.en: [Owen] Okay.
[man] Now, stop me when I say something that's not true.
translation.es: Detenme cuando diga algo que no es verdad.

translation.en: The world sends you messages.
[Owen] Yes.
[man] Words are often code words,
or pass phrases for important secrets.
[Owen] Yes.
[man] You're visited by a brother no one else in your family is aware of.
translation.es: Te visita un hermanoque tu familia no conoce.

translation.en: A facsimile of your brother Jed.
translation.es: Alguien parecido a tu hermano Jed.

translation.en: -[Owen] Yes. -[man] He sends you messages.
Instructions for important missions you must accomplish.
translation.es: Instrucciones para misiones importantesque debes cumplir.

translation.en: [Owen] To see the deeper truth.
[man] He tells you you're meant to do something big,
translation.es: Te dice que naciste para algo grande,

translation.en: something that matters to the world,
and that you're not meant to do it alone.
translation.es: y que no debes hacerlo solo.

translation.en: All you need is a partner.
[Owen] Yes.
[audio billboard] You made a promise to me, and you made a promise to yourself.
You promised we'd golf together in Hilton Head.
translation.es: Que jugaríamos al golf juntosen Hilton Head.

translation.en: [man] You sense danger all around you, but you stay disciplined.
translation.es: Sientes el peligro a tu alrededor,pero mantienes la disciplina.

translation.en: A fight's coming.
Something even bigger than this world.
translation.es: Algo aún más grande que este mundo.

translation.en: Possibly extending to multiple galaxies.
-[elevator] Fourth floor. Thank you. -[Owen] Yes.
Hello, Mrs. Finkelstein.
Fuck off, Donovan.
It's, uh, Owen.
-Owen Milgrim... -[Finkelstein] Fuck off, Donovan.
translation.es: - Owen Milgrim.- Vete al carajo, Donovan.

translation.en: Never mind.
Good.
Does it feel good to be heard?
translation.es: - ¿Se siente bien que te escuchen?- Sí.

translation.en: [man] Does it feel good to know that you're not alone with this information?
translation.es: ¿Se siente bien saberque no estás solo con esta información?

translation.en: [Owen] Yeah.
[man] Will you complete your mission?
[Owen] Maybe.
[man] Am I a trusted messenger?
[Owen] Yes.
[man] Good. Then here are your real instructions.
Repeat after me.
There is no pattern.
[Owen] There is no pattern.
[man] I am vulnerable, but I am not stupid.
translation.es: Soy vulnerable, pero no soy estúpido.

translation.en: [Owen] I'm vulnerable, but I'm not stupid.
translation.es: Soy vulnerable, pero no soy estúpido.

translation.en: But I will seek out the people in my life that care about me.
translation.es: Pero buscaré a las personas en mi vidaque se preocupan por mí.

translation.en: [Owen] I will seek out the people in my life who care about me.
translation.es: Buscaré a las personas en mi vidaque se preocupan por mí.

translation.en: I am not the chosen one.
[Owen] I am not the chosen one.
-The voices aren't real. -[clattering]
-[Owen] The voices aren't real. -The voices aren't real.
The voices are just noise.
-[Owen] The voices are just noise. -The voices are just noise.
I am just a guy with a vivid imagination.
translation.es: Soy solo un hombrecon una imaginación brillante.

translation.en: [Owen] I'm just a guy with a vivid imagination.
translation.es: Soy solo un hombrecon una imaginación brillante.

translation.en: I will most likely not be the savior of our galaxy.
translation.es: Lo más probable es que no seael salvador de nuestra galaxia.

translation.en: Hello?
[man, distorted] I've got a package from Neberdine Pharmaceutical Biotech
translation.es: Tengo un paquete de Neberdine:Medicamentos y Biotecnología

translation.en: for an Owen Milgrim.
What?
[man] I've got a package. Your name.
translation.es: Tengo un paquete con tu nombre.

translation.en: Hello?
[woman] Hi, Owen. Did you get what I sent you?
translation.es: Hola, Owen. ¿Recibiste lo que te envié?

translation.en: [Owen] How did you...?
[woman] I've just been informed that you qualify as a hero candidate.
translation.es: Me acaban de informarque calificas como un candidato héroe.

translation.en: -What does that mean? -[woman] It's a term we use
translation.es: ¿Qué significa? Así llamamos a los elegidos

translation.en: for those who've been specifically selected for one of our studies.
translation.es: Así llamamos a los elegidos para nuestros estudios.

translation.en: You're a very desirable individual to us, Owen.
translation.es: Eres una persona muy atractivapara nosotros.

translation.en: I've never seen B.N. over-ratios like this before.
translation.es: Nunca antes vi resultados como estos.

translation.en: What does a hero candidate do? [woman] Exactly the things they were born to.
translation.es: - ¿Qué hace un candidato héroe?- Justo lo que está destinado a hacer.

translation.en: In your case, helping us treat maladies ranging from sluggishness and depression,
translation.es: Nos ayudarás a tratar dolenciasdesde la lentitud y la depresión

translation.en: to I.B.S, to popcorn problems and irrational fears.
translation.es: hasta el colon irritable, el goteoy los miedos irracionales.

translation.en: "Popcorn problems"?
[woman] Prostate problems, yes.
Oh, I thought you...
[woman] We'll give you all the details when you come in.
translation.es: Te daremos todos los detalles al venir.

translation.en: So, we'll see you on Monday?
♪ Someday you're gonna feel lonely ♪
♪ Someday you're gonna feel blue ♪
♪ Someday you'll long for me only ♪
translation.es: Algún día me desearás solo a mí

translation.en: Good evening, Mr. Milgrim.
Everyone is on the patio for the recital. Thank you.
translation.es: - Todos están en el patio por el recital.- Gracias.

translation.en: ♪ Someday you're gonna feel weary ♪
♪ You'll grieve when I'm far away ♪
♪ Then you'll be missin' My huggin' and my kissin' ♪
translation.es: Luego extrañarás mis abrazos y besos

translation.en: ♪ You'll remember what I say ♪
♪ You'll never know The good fellow I've been ♪
translation.es: Nunca sabrás lo buena persona que fui

translation.en: -♪ Until I've gone away ♪ -♪ Till I've gone away ♪ ♪ Gone away ♪
translation.es: - Hasta que desaparezca.- Hasta que desaparezca.

translation.en: ♪ You're bound to miss The little things that I did ♪
translation.es: Seguro extrañarásLas pequeñas cosas que hice

translation.en: -♪ I did ♪ -♪ For you each day ♪
translation.es: - Hice por ti cada día- Por ti cada día

translation.en: -♪ You're gonna yearn ♪ -♪ You will be yearning ♪
-♪ For my returning ♪ -♪ For my returning ♪
-♪ You're bound to miss me ♪ -♪ You're bound to miss me ♪
translation.es: - Seguro me extrañarás- Seguro me extrañarás

translation.en: -♪ You'll long to kiss me ♪ -♪ You'll long to kiss me ♪
♪ You'll never know The good fellow I've been ♪
translation.es: Nunca sabrás lo buena persona que fui

translation.en: -♪ Until I've gone away ♪ -♪ Until I've gone away ♪
♪ Till I've gone away ♪
Where does she sleep when she stays over?
[Belle] This one?
Yeah, she's your sister, right?
Or is she a secret agent?
How did you know?
[whispering] Because I have super-secret sources
at a super-secret agency.
Don't tell anyone.
[whispers] Okay.
Supper's ready.
Okay, Mom.
I was completely baffled.
You know, I left for school.
Ernie was fine, and then, you know, the food was in the bowl.
translation.es: Ernie estaba bieny la comida estaba en el plato.

translation.en: The water was there, cage was locked up,
translation.es: Había agua y la jaula estaba cerrada.

translation.en: and I get back from basketball practice,
translation.es: Al regresar de entrenar baloncesto,se había ido.

translation.en: -and he's just gone, absolutely... -The great gerbil escape artist.
translation.es: Al regresar de entrenar baloncesto,se había ido. - Desapareció.- El gran jerbo escapista.

translation.en: -But he wasn't exactly fucking gone. -Language, Phil.
translation.es: No se fue a la mierda. - Sin groserías.- Sí.

translation.en: No, that's correct. He wasn't exactly fucking gone like that.
translation.es: - Sin groserías.- Sí. No se fue a la mierda así.

translation.en: -[Angelica] Language, Jed. -Where'd he go, O?
Maybe you shouldn't curse so much in front of the children.
translation.es: Sin groserías frente a los niños. Sí escuchaste.

translation.en: -Ah, come on. Tell the rest. -[Angelica] This is not a farmyard, boys.
translation.es: Sí escuchaste. No es un corral, chicos.

translation.en: So, um, I ask everyone, right?
Everyone's looking around the whole house, everyone frantic,
translation.es: Todos buscaban desesperados por la casa

translation.en: and finally Owen, you know, eventually comes up and brings me to his room...
translation.es: y por fin apareció Oweny me llevó a su cuarto.

translation.en: How old were you then, Owen? Like, eight or somethin'?
-Nine. -[Jed] Eight or nine, whatever. And he says-- He says,
translation.es: - Nueve.- Ocho o nueve, lo que sea. Y me dijo...

translation.en: "Uh, I have to tell you somethin'. My-- My hawk ate Ernie."
translation.es: "Tengo que decirte algo.Mi halcón se comió a Ernie".

translation.en: "What?" And he points over there,
and there's this big fuckin' red-tailed hawk
translation.es: y había un halcón grande de cola roja

translation.en: sitting on his desk staring at me.
What eight-year-old has a fuckin' hawk?
translation.es: ¿Qué niño de ocho años tiene un halcón?

translation.en: Uh, how did you have a hawk?
Um, I rescued it from the park.
I found it with a broken wing and brought it to my room and fed it.
translation.es: Lo encontré con un ala rota,lo traje a mi cuarto y lo alimenté.

translation.en: [Jed] Yeah, I forgot. That...
That was the craziest part. He would feed it, like a mother bird, you know...
translation.es: Esa era la parte más loca.Lo alimentaba como una mamá pájaro...

translation.en: Oh, masticate-- No, no, no. Premasticate.
-Yeah, premastication! -[man] Jed was a chronic masticater.
translation.es: - Así es.- Jed era masticador crónico.

translation.en: -[Jed] How'd you know? -[man] You can go blind doing that.
How long did you take care of the bird for, Owen?
Two or three months, until it was strong enough
translation.es: Dos o tres meses, hasta que tuvo fuerzas

translation.en: to go into Jed's room and eat his gerbil, I guess.
translation.es: para ir al cuarto de Jedy comerse su jerbo, supongo.

translation.en: But what happened to the hawk?
We set it free.
Oh. Okay. [Porter] That reminds me.
Remember when Colby fell in the Gowanus Canal?
-Remember that day? -[Angelica] Oh, poor Colby.
[Porter] I threw the stick,
-he didn't go for it... -[Angelica] So traumatizing.
translation.es: no lo buscó, me di vuelta y...

translation.en: [Adelaide] I told Jed I wouldn't marry him until they painted you in.
translation.es: Le dije a Jed que no me casaré con élhasta que te pinten.

translation.en: Maybe that's why we haven't set a date yet.
translation.es: Tal vez por esoaún no hemos fijado la fecha.

translation.en: They're gonna paint me in.
The artist just took a six-month sabbatical to Nepal,
translation.es: El artista se tomóseis meses sabáticos en Nepal

translation.en: to study the light.
I lost my job.
I'm sorry, Owen.
It's okay, I'll find a new one.
I'm actually thinking about becoming... a temporary volunteer husband.
translation.es: De hecho, estoy pensandoen ser un esposo temporal voluntario.

translation.en: You're not serious.
Get rid of my lease, bounce from widow to widow.
translation.es: No pagar alquiler e ir de viuda en viuda.

translation.en: Do you ever notice that your plans always involve starting over...
translation.es: ¿No te das cuenta de que tus planessiempre implican empezar de nuevo

translation.en: often with an entirely new identity?
It's a good fantasy.
[Angelica] Pudding's upstairs by the fireplace, everyone.
translation.es: Vengan a comer el postrejunto a la chimenea.

translation.en: Just to get through the post-dinner conversation.
translation.es: Para soportar la charla tras la cena.

translation.en: Think about it.
Seriously...
as a hypothetical.
Say you and I left, right? Tonight.
translation.es: Digamos que tú y yo nos vamos esta noche.

translation.en: I got us passports, new identities.
You steal all the money from Jed's bank account.
translation.es: Y desocupas la cuenta bancaria de Jed.

translation.en: We just... do that.
We get a house in the middle of nowhere.
translation.es: Conseguimos una casa en medio de la nada.

translation.en: Start again.
Different people.
Are we a married couple?
We don't...
We can be, you know...
We don't have to be. We could be brother, or sister, or... friends.
translation.es: No es necesario.Podemos ser hermanos o amigos.

translation.en: So... tonight, then, after dessert?
Yeah.
I'm serious. Let's do it.
You're fucking with me.
I got you.
You believed me.
This week's gonna be a living hell for me.
translation.es: Esta semana será un infierno para mí.

translation.en: He'll totally win.
He's not guilty. No chance of a conviction.
translation.es: Es inocente.No hay posibilidad de condena.

translation.en: It's all just so humiliating.
I mean, it's been going on for fucking ages,
all just for one day in court.
translation.es: Todo por un día en el tribunal.

translation.en: Because he didn't do it, so...
translation.es: Porque no lo hizo, así que...

translation.en: You're positive?
Right? You were actually with him?
Yes.
[Phil] You would make that move.
-[man 1] What does that even mean? -[Phil] You would make that move. [man 2] That's the move--
Hey, Owen, you're not trying to sneak off, are you?
No, Dad. I need a second of your time before you leave.
translation.es: - No, papá.- Quiero hablarte antes de que te vayas.

translation.en: Come on, boys, it's time.
translation.es: Vamos, chicos, ya es la hora.

translation.en: [all] Balderdash!
-[Angelica] Owen, you're staying to play. -No, I-- I have to go.
translation.es: Owen, te quedas a jugar. No, tengo que irme. Tengo algo...

translation.en: -I have something... -[Angelica] You love Balderdash.
No, I don't.
Come on, stay, it will be fun.
I have a fundamental problem with Balderdash.
I gotta say, what a delicious meal that was.
translation.es: Debo decir que fue una cena deliciosa.

translation.en: So good, Mom. So good.
-You used to love Balderdash. -Mom, no, I didn't.
translation.es: Te encantaba Balderdash. - No.- ¿Quién quiere helado?

translation.en: -[Jed] Who wants ice cream? -[children yelling]
-Who wants ice cream? Oh, you do? -I do!
Of course. But whoever's the quietest gets ice cream, I promise. Mom.
translation.es: Pero el menos ruidoso come helado.Hola, mamá.

translation.en: Oh, are we playing Balderdash, or what?
So, um... [clears throat] I've been considering...
Considering leaving Roosevelt Island?
-No... -[Angelica] Oh, thank God.
So, have Hal help you find something closer.
translation.es: Dile a Hal que te ayudea buscar algo más cerca.

translation.en: -Oh, you moving closer? -[Owen] I'm not moving closer.
Crazy to think that every word did get invented.
translation.es: Es una locura que ya se inventarantodas las palabras.

translation.en: I-- I have to go. Goodbye.
-Wait, you're not playing Balderdash? -No, I can't. Bye.
translation.es: - ¿No juegas al Balderdash?- No puedo. Adiós.

translation.en: Oh, Owen, come on, you love Balderdash.
translation.es: - Vamos. Te encanta.- No me encanta el maldito Balderdash.

translation.en: No, I don't fucking love Balderdash! Balderdash is bullshit. [clears throat]
translation.es: - Vamos. Te encanta.- No me encanta el maldito Balderdash. Es una mierda.

translation.en: -Jesus, Owen. -Is he off his meds?
translation.es: - Por Dios.- ¿Dejó de tomar la medicación?

translation.en: -[Belle cries] -I'll walk you to the station.
-[Phil] Don't worry about Uncle Owen. -Aggressive.
translation.es: No te preocupes por el tío.

translation.en: [Phil] He's a spaz. We're gonna get ice cream now.
translation.es: Es un tarado. Ahora vamos a comer helado.

translation.en: -[Porter] Is it a money crisis? -[Owen] No.
I know it's an expensive apartment to rent, but...
translation.es: Sé que es un apartamento caropara alquilar, pero...

translation.en: Have you...? Have you thought about a...? A roommate?
I don't know why you won't let us just buy you a place.
translation.es: No sé por qué no dejasque te compremos una casa.

translation.en: That way you'd have more security.
Or you... You could come and work for the company.
translation.es: O podrías venir a trabajar en la empresa.

translation.en: All your brothers do.
I already agreed, okay?
You don't need to buy me off.
Uh... I don't... I don't follow you. What--?
I will lie for Jed...
next week in court.
translation.es: La semana que viene en el tribunal.

translation.en: I get the expectation.
It's not an expectation, Owen, it's a gift.
translation.es: No es una expectativa, es un regalo.

translation.en: You are giving your brother the gift of an alibi.
translation.es: Le estás regalando a tu hermanouna coartada.

translation.en: This woman is an opportunist. She sees an in.
translation.es: Esta mujer es una oportunista.Ve una forma de entrar.

translation.en: [sighs] You're protecting him.
-You're protecting the family. -Right.
I know, I know, it sounds muddled, but that is the way reality works, Owen.
translation.es: Sé que suena confuso,pero así funciona la realidad.

translation.en: -How's that, Dad? -[poop bot chatters]
With... With adjustments.
Just so you know, I got a new job.
translation.es: Para que sepas, tengo un trabajo nuevo.

translation.en: Oh? What...? What job?
Business... marketing.
It involves travel, so I'll be gone a couple days next week,
translation.es: Implica viajar, así que me iréunos días la próxima semana,

translation.en: but I'll be back in time for the trial.
And... don't worry if you can't reach me.
translation.es: Y no te preocupes si no me encuentras.

translation.en: Someone invented a new kind of ham.
translation.es: Alguien inventó un nuevo tipo de jamón.

translation.en: That's... That's wonderful, Owen.
That's-- That's-- That's great.
Milgrim men, we always come out on top.
Anyway...
-All right. -[poop bot chatters]
-[dog whimpers] -[Porter] Hey, Colby, it's a Tristan 500.
-[poop bot] Cleaning in progress. -[Porter] No kicking and licking.
translation.es: - Limpieza en curso.- Sin patadas y lamidas. SANEAMIENTO

translation.en: [woman over PA] Find the end of your rainbow
translation.es: Encuentra el final de tu arco iris

translation.en: at Neberdine Pharmaceutical and Biotech.
Psst, buddy. Which one are you here for?
It should be on the form right there.
It says, uh, U.L.P.
Me too.
That's a good one.
It's the big time.
Get ready to make a lot of fuckin' money.
[woman over PA] Carol Cuddy. Carol Cuddy, please report to D.M. test room three
translation.es: Carol Cuddy, presénteseen la sala de pruebas DM 3

translation.en: for A.E.B Phase I.
translation.es: para AEB fase I. ENSAYO ULP FASE III

translation.en: What do the bombs mean?
High-risk. That's where the dollars come from.
translation.es: Alto riesgo. Por eso pagan tan bien.

translation.en: Apparently, they're havin' some kind of problem with this new drug.
translation.es: Al parecer, tienen algún problemacon esta nueva droga.

translation.en: -I think you should let me do it again. -Strong stuff. Very trippy shit.
translation.es: - Déjame hacerlo otra vez.- Es fuerte. Alucinante.

translation.en: -[woman] Who's in charge of the red light? -That doesn't bother you?
translation.es: ¿Quién maneja la luz roja? ¿Eso no te preocupa?

translation.en: -No. -I don't fucking understand.
-No risk, no reward. -I'm supposed to be part of the trial.
-I'm sorry. -This is fucking bullshit.
translation.es: Lo siento. Esto es una mierda.

translation.en: [woman over PA] Jon Mallard, please report to D.M. test room one.
translation.es: John Mallory,preséntese en la sala de pruebas DM 1.

translation.en: Jon Mallard, please report to D.M. test room one for Rumi Phase III.
translation.es: John Mallory,preséntese en la sala de pruebas DM 1 para Rumi fase III.

translation.en: [woman] Patricia. Patricia.
-[woman] I have to get into that study. -[second woman] Ma'am?
translation.es: - Tengo que estar en ese estudio.- ¿Señora?

translation.en: [woman] You have a daughter. Her name is Usnavy, and she goes to Hunter College.
translation.es: Tienes una hija. Su nombre es Usnavyy asiste a Hunter.

translation.en: [woman over PA] Owen Milgrim, please report to D.M. test room five.
translation.es: Owen Milgrim,preséntese a la sala de pruebas DM 5.

translation.en: Owen Milgrim, please report to D.M. test room five for U.L.P. screening.
translation.es: Owen Milgrim,preséntese a la sala de pruebas DM 5 para la prueba de ULP.

translation.en: Steven McDougal, please report to test room eight.
translation.es: Steven McDougal,preséntese a la sala de pruebas 8.

translation.en: Steven McDougal, please report to test room eight for M.S. One Phase II.
translation.es: Steven McDougal,preséntese a la sala de pruebas 8 para MS 1 fase II.

translation.en: [Owen] Unnecessary.
[woman] Try to answer with an emotion, rather than a description.
translation.es: Trate de responder con una emoción,en vez de una descripción.

translation.en: Uh... calm.
[Owen] Justice.
-Is this personalized somehow? -[woman] No.
Focus on your answers.
-Suffocated. -[woman] Good.
Now, Mr. Milgrim...
please turn your attention to me
as I ask you this final question.
translation.es: mientras le hago la última pregunta.

translation.en: Are you gonna ask it?
-Does that disqualify me? -[machine beeps]
Your defense mechanisms are fungible.
translation.es: Sus mecanismos de defensa son fungibles.

translation.en: You've been accepted.
[woman over PA] Find the end of your rainbow
translation.es: Encuentra el final de tu arco iris

translation.en: at Neberdine Pharmaceutical and Biotech.
Stop looking at me.
Did...? Did you...?
Did you lose your husband recently?
Did you lose your husband recently?
-[Owen] But I just saw... -Leave me alone.
translation.es: - Pero acabo de ver...- Déjame en paz.

translation.en: Do you play golf in Hilton Head?
I'll kill you.
I have a gun.
[Patricia over PA] Attention, please, all participants in the U.L.P. Phase III trial,
translation.es: Atención, por favor. Los participantesdel ensayo ULP fase III,

translation.en: please look at your lanyards.
If you are an odd number, please line up at the intake corridor.
translation.es: Si tienen un número impar,formen una fila en el pasillo de entrada.

translation.en: All even numbers will be next.
It's Jed.
No, it's Grimsson.
Mustache. No, don't say anything. Just be cool.
translation.es: El bigote. No digas nada.Mantén la calma.

translation.en: The pattern is the pattern.
The pattern got you here.
Keep trusting the pattern.
She's your handler now.
translation.es: Ella se encargará de ti ahora.

translation.en: She has a certain je ne sais quoi.
translation.es: Tiene un cierto je ne sais quoi.

translation.en: She's no Olivia, though.
Make contact with her. Use the code phrase.
translation.es: Ponte en contacto con ella. Usa el código.

translation.en: [Patricia over PA] If you are an odd number,
please line up at the intake corridor.
translation.es: formen una fila en el pasillo de entrada.

translation.en: The pattern is the pattern. I know it doesn't make sense.
translation.es: El patrón es el patrón.Sé que no tiene sentido.

translation.en: It doesn't make sense to me either right now, but it will.
translation.es: Para mí tampoco tiene sentido,pero lo tendrá.

translation.en: Keep going forward.
Just reach out...
and make contact.
[Patricia over PA] All odd numbers, line up by the intake corridor.
translation.es: Todos los números impares,formen fila en el pasillo de entrada.

translation.en: What the fuck is wrong with you?
Sorry.
Robert, wake up.
The odds are here.
Okay.
Let us complete this trial with none of the old problems, sir.
translation.es: Completemos este ensayosin los antiguos problemas.

translation.en: Yes, Dr. Fujita.
None of the old problems.
[orderly] As you enter the common room,
translation.es: Al entrar a la sala común,

translation.en: you will notice there are numbers on the pods.
The pod numbers correspond with the numbers on your lanyards.
translation.es: Ese número correspondeal número de sus pases.

translation.en: Please go to your pod.
That will be your home for the duration of your stay here with us.
translation.es: Será su hogar durante su estadíaaquí con nosotros.

translation.en: Leaving your pod at any unauthorized moment
translation.es: Si abandonan la cabina sin permiso,

translation.en: will result in the termination of your stay here at this trial,
translation.es: será el fin de su estadía aquíen este ensayo

translation.en: as well as bringing shame and humiliation upon you.
translation.es: además de una vergüenzay humillación para ustedes.

translation.en: Once you reach your pod, an orderly will approach
translation.es: Cuando lleguen a su cabina,se acercará un asistente

translation.en: and begin to inspect your bag.
translation.es: y comenzará a revisar sus bolsos.

translation.en: Once the orderly has inspected your bag, you will put your bag in your locker.
translation.es: Una vez revisado el bolso,lo pondrán en su casillero.

translation.en: Once you have done that, make your way to this gentleman.
translation.es: Luego se dirigirán a este caballero.

translation.en: He will give you your uniform,
as well as your patented Neberdine shoes,
translation.es: y sus zapatos patentados de Neberdine,

translation.en: which you cannot take with you at the end of the trial.
translation.es: que no se pueden llevaral final del ensayo.

translation.en: Once you have your uniforms and your shoes,
translation.es: Cuando tengan el uniforme y los zapatos,

translation.en: you will make your way back to your pods,
then you will get in your pods and change clothes in your pods.
translation.es: entrarán y se cambiarán en la cabina.

translation.en: There will be no changing in the commons.
translation.es: No se cambiarán en la sala común.

translation.en: Oh, my God!
[orderly] Condoms are contraband.
-Safety first. -[orderly] That's a red flag right there.
translation.es: - Seguridad ante todo.- Es una señal de alerta.

translation.en: Intimacy in this facility is off-limits.
translation.es: Está prohibido tener intimidaden estas instalaciones.

translation.en: There will be no cohabitation inside the pods.
translation.es: No habrá convivenciadentro de las cabinas.

translation.en: Once the curfew starts, lights go out.
translation.es: Al empezar el toque de queda,se apagan las luces.

translation.en: You're not supposed to be here.
Please.
What are my instructions?
The pattern is the pattern.
You're my contact. What are my instructions?
[whispering] Please turn off the pattern. Please turn off...
-Owen. -[orderly] ..tight schedule.
We will tell you when there is mealtime.
translation.es: Les diremos cuándo es hora de comer.

translation.en: Your instructions are to go back to your pod and await my signal.
translation.es: Debes volver a la cabinay esperar mi señal.

translation.en: [orderly] ...two Etch A Sketches and one Lite-Brite. Please don't fight over them.
translation.es: Hay dos pizarras mágicasy un juego de luces. No se peleen.

translation.en: I'm going to save the world.
[orderly] We will tell you when there's recreation time.
translation.es: Les diremos cuándo hay tiempo libre.

translation.en: Yes. You're gonna save the world.
translation.es: - Sí.- También... - Vas a salvar al mundo.- Y cuándo dormir.

translation.en: [orderly] ...and we will tell you when to sleep.
translation.es: - Vas a salvar al mundo.- Y cuándo dormir.

translation.en: -But not if you blow our cover. -[orderly] ...expecting. Thank you.
Is that working for you?
Okay, I understand.
[orderly] If you're having trouble getting into your pod,
translation.es: Si tienen problemaspara entrar a la cabina,

translation.en: there is also a little ladder underneath that will help you get into your pod.
translation.es: también hay una escalerita debajoque los ayudará a entrar.

translation.en: Also note, from here on in,
you will be referred to as the number on your lanyard. You are the Odds.
translation.es: los llamarán por el número en sus pases.Ustedes son los Impares

translation.en: Attention.
Please give your attention to Dr. Muramoto and Dr. Fujita.
translation.es: Por favor, escuchenal Dr. Muramoto y la Dra. Fujita.

translation.en: They will be supervising your trials.
Welcome, subjects.
You made the right choice.
It's time to start your lives again.
translation.es: Es hora de empezar sus vidas de nuevo.

translation.en: You don't fuck this up...
I won't fuck this up.
Just kidding.
